name: Figma File Thumbnail Covers
description:
If you, like me, want your figma organized but still minimal try these subtle thumbnail covers.


Includes covers for your Projects and Library Files. Projects are subtle with color coded statuses. Libraries stand out so you can always find the them at a glance


For project covers, this template includes 4 project states but you can customize to fit your teams process:


🎨 Working

📐 Ready for dev

🚀 Shipped

🗞 Archive


Project covers have pre-made tags for links to Jira and Google Docs to link your related documents. Swap these logos and links if your teams use something different.
